mapper.select: SELECT P.POSITION_CODE, P.POSITION_NAME, P.USE_YN, COUNT(E.EMP_CODE) AS USERS FROM POSITION_T P LEFT JOIN EMP_T E ON P.POSITION_CODE = E.POSITION_CODE GROUP BY P.POSITION_CODE, P.POSITION_NAME, P.USE_YN ORDER BY P.POSITION_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POSITION_T ( POSITION_CODE, POSITION_NAME, USE_YN ) VALUES ( #{posCode}, #{posName}, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT POSITION_CODE, POSITION_NAME, USE_YN FROM POSITION_T WHERE POSITION_NAME = #{positionName}
